Posted By: chrivers (5/9/2010 1:03:32 PM)

posts.post_content:
I agree with SoulReaverDan. If you are playing this card, then you are in an older format. Fauna Shaman is good, but [Survival of the Fittest](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Survival of the Fittest) surpasses her by leaps and bound.
  
   
Survival to pitch something, fetch Iona, pitch her, fetch Retainers.
  
   
Fun times.
